title: unnai anri
sahitya:
unnaiyanri utra tuNai ulagil yArayyA murugayyA enakk

(unnaiyanri)



anupallavi



annaimalai magaLaLitta Arumukha deivamE

anjum mukham kATTAmal ANDaruLum shelvamE 

(unnaiyanri)



caraNam



Adi varum mayil mIdil amarnduraiyum azhaginE

anbargaLai kAkka vanda AriraNDu kaiyanE

IDillAda inbattamizhil ishai virumbum sheviyanE

innamudAi ennuyiril ilangiDum nallamudanE 

(unaiyanri)
